attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those 'under the age' to be tried as adults, should no-longer be protected. If the age of the individual is unknown, or the crime is greater than theft, the individual should be held responsible for their actions.
For example a murderer is a murderer, regardless of age.
I can think back to many murders that have been committed by those considered 'Under-age' to be tried properly, they get their names changed and their education paid for, this is ridiculous.
Lets make ALL criminals pay!
